query: SELECT e.turmaId, t.codigo, COUNT(*) as total, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT e.local) as locais FROM eventos e JOIN turmas t ON e.turmaId = t.id WHERE e.dataEvento IS NOT NULL AND e.local IS NOT NULL GROUP BY e.turmaId LIMIT 5
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WG3DCJNDgKq1ck.d12df11ceaba --database axWmxYbCBHHB5ETKSgA95A --execute SELECT e.turmaId, t.codigo, COUNT(*) as total, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT e.local) as locais FROM eventos e JOIN turmas t ON e.turmaId = t.id WHERE e.dataEvento IS NOT NULL AND e.local IS NOT NULL GROUP BY e.turmaId LIMIT 5
